heroDialogue.text: Oh you're finally here! Someone in here killed Green! Green's body is over there... Oh, the humanity!

Switch to path after Dialogue Completed.id: Switch to path after Dialogue Completed

dialogue.text: Gasp!  It was Yellow all along!

heroDialogue.text: Green lies on the ground in a puddle of blood.  A knife is next to them. and a note...
I don't have much time... Yellow is planning something terrible.  My only hope is that someone finds this hidden note to stop Yellow before~~~~~

items.effectValue: Yellow definitely killed Green, I am innocent. You don't think it was me do you?

options.effectValue: Yes, I think it was you who killed Green
No, I think you are innocent

items.effectValue: What? I just told you I was innocent. You are a bad detective. It was Yellow
You are smart. It was definitely Yellow
Hello I am the detective in charge of this case. Let me know when you have found the primary suspect

options.effectValue: Follow me to the prime suspect
